9.heading: "From Sex to Death."
9.title: Killed Cartoons : Casualties from the War on Free Expression
9.author: edited by David Wallis.

contents.title: Indecent exposure : from sex to death
Profiles in no courage : editors playing politics
Fall from race : nothing is black and white
Protection racket : corporate power at work.

notes: "With censored cartoons, many unpublished, by the likes of Garry Trudeau, Doug Marlette, Paul Conrad, Herblock, and Mike Luckovich (all Pulitzer Prize winners or finalists) as well as unearthed editorial illustrations by Norman Rockwell, Edward Sorel, and Anita Kunz, you will find yourself surprised and often shocked by the images themselves, and outraged by the fact that a fearful editor kept you from seeing them"
back cover.

20.heading: From Spotted Strips to Comic Strips.
20.title: "Pierre Alechinsky, de la Bande Mouchetée à la Bande Dessinée"
20.author: Dominique Radrizzani
20.appears_in: p. 76-83 in 9e Art : les Cahiers du Musée de la Bande Dessinée, no. 6 (Jan. 2001). Begins: "À l'heure où le Musée Jenisch de Vevy lui consacre une rétrospective et oú la grande esposition du Jeu de Paume (1998) fait escale au Musée d'Art Moderne d'Ostende, nous avons choisi de nous intéresser ici à l'influence que la bande dessinée a pu exercer sur la peinture d'Alechinsky, compatriote d'Hergé dont il apparaît, sous bien de rapports, comme l'exact contraire."
notes: English summary (from p. 151): "Pierre Alechinsky, from Spotted Strips to Comic Strips. Alechinsky, the Belgian painter, has never made a secret of the influence of comic art on his work. His paintings are the most often divided into frames between which he weaves a sort of non narrative composition. Dominique Radrizzani, a specialist on this artist and curator of the Musée Jenish in Vevey, which has just devoted a retrospective to him, examines the poetic dialogue between the shapes."

78.title: "From the Heart"

notes: Cover title: The Quest of Lois Lane.
Guest starring Wonder Woman, Lori Lemaris.

Summary: Lois goes to Bhutran in the Himalayas to investigate a heroin story and meets a priest who takes her up a mountain for a spiritual revelation, which helps her decide to go back and marry Clark. Mean while Wonder Woman is helping Superman investigate his lack of powers and his feelings towards Lois.

116.heading: From Watchmen to From Hell.
116.title: "De Watchmen à From Hell : Quelques Obessessions et Procédés Récurrents dans l'Oeuvre d'Alan Moore"
116.author: Thierry Groensteen
116.appears_in: p. 102-107 in 9e Art : les Cahiers du Musée de la Bande Dessinée, no. 6 (Jan. 2001).
notes: (Alan Moore : [Dossier])

Begins: "De Miracleman à Watchmen, de V for Vendetta à From Hell, la question du pouvoir est centrale dans l'œuvre d'Alan Moore, qui ne cesse de s'interroger sur ses bons et ses mauvais usages, et d'en appeler à la responsabilité de chaque citoyen."

English summary (from p. 151): "From Watchmen to From Hell : Some Obsessions and Recurring Procedures in Alan Moore's Work. Thierry Groensteen places Moore's two major works face to face and underlines the constancy of certain themes, especially that of power: the writer constantly examines its good and bad uses and invokes citizens' responsibility."
